verses.name: Ecclesiastes 12:10
verses.text: The preacher sought to find out acceptable words: and that which was written was upright, even words of truth.

verses.name: Ecclesiastes 12:11
verses.text: The words of the wise are as goads, and as nails fastened by the masters of assemblies, which are given from one shepherd.

verses.name: Ecclesiastes 12:12
verses.text: And further, by these, my son, be admonished: of making many books there is no end; and much study is a weariness of the flesh.

verses.name: Ecclesiastes 12:13
verses.text: Let us hear the conclusion of the whole matter: Fear God, and keep his commandments: for this is the whole duty of man.
